title: Apaches
overview: Miguel used to work in a news agency, had a lovely girlfriend and lived in a comfortable apartment downtown, but one day he finds out that his father has been swindled. His need to recover what has been taken from them and to seek revenge will take him to reunite with Sastre, his childhood best friend, who over the years has turned into a young felon. Together, they will begin to rob the jewelries and watch factories of all those who collaborated to bankrupt Miguel's father. Hit after hit they are getting closer to the goal until a mysterious girl, Carol, crosses their path.
